definitions.definition: A formal exposition of a subject , especially a research paper that students write in order to complete the requirements for a doctoral degree in the US and a non-doctoral degree in the UK; a thesis .
A lengthy lecture on a subject; a treatise ; a discourse ; a sermon .

main_definition: A formal exposition of a subject , especially a research paper that students write in order to complete the requirements for a doctoral degree in the US and a non-doctoral degree in the UK; a thesis .
secondary_definitions: A lengthy lecture on a subject; a treatise ; a discourse ; a sermon .
